column1: '''Bilbo''' is Swedish video game made by [[Nils Eng]]. In this game it isn't [[Frodo Baggins
column4: the Ring]] to [[Mount Doom]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/bilbo.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 7 (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref> But because of criticism on his webpage that Eng didn't follow the books the names of Bilbo were changed to Frodo.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> This new version was released in [[1997]]. The title however was not changed.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
